snippet.title: 6 Nights - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
A race to earn big money in this buying and selling property game. Outwit your opponents and make them stay for 6 nights. Charge them big rents and claim total domination.

Developed by TopArcadeApps
Published by Volens Nolens Games
Also released on iOS

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #boardgames #boardgame #6nights #toparcadeapps #monopoly #monopolyclone #monopolyripoff

FUN FACT: 6 Nights was originally released for iOS in 2014. The PC version you see here was released on Desura in 2015 and Steam in 2016. And yes, things barely changed from the original iOS release of this Monopoly clone, other than the fact the Steam version has Trading Cards and Remote Play Together.
